World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 16 日星期二 17:01:48 GMT 120
Putin says Ukraine's statehood at risk if pattern of war continuesRussian President Vladimir Putin said on Tuesday that Ukraine's statehood could suffer an "irreparable blow" if the pattern of the war continued, and Russia would never be forced to abandon the gains it had made. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 16:23:48 GMT JAL2P7PERNNQLPSSR7IPHRX2UEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-ukraines-statehood-risk-if-pattern-war-continues-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine says Polish protesters lift blockade of two border crossingsUkraine's border authorities said that Polish truck drivers who had been blocking three crossings on the Polish-Ukrainian border lifted their blockade at two of them on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 16:04:18 GMT XNHW6OIVTRM4TCUDH4H5FAPCAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-polish-protesters-lift-blockade-two-border-crossings-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Putin says past U.S. elections were riggedRussian President Vladimir Putin, running for a new six-year term in an election that his opponents say is a parody of democracy, said on Tuesday that past U.S. elections had been rigged by postal voting. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 16:02:31 GMT RZWNTB32BZL5NPVAJNGSYS4EZI https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-says-past-us-elections-were-rigged-2024-01-16/Reuters世界
Exclusive: US targets Houthi anti-ship missiles in new strike on Yemen, officials sayThe U.S. military on Tuesday carried out a new strike in Yemen against four Houthi anti-ship ballistic missiles, two U.S. officials told Reuters, the latest move against the Iran-aligned group over its targeting of Red Sea shipping. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:41:55 GMT DRCOXUQHEZNMTCMEIE3Y6CA6LA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-targets-houthi-anti-ship-missiles-new-strike-yemen-officials-2024-01-16/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界中东
EU states give nod to Red Sea mission to deter Houthis -diplomatsEuropean Union member states have given initial backing to a naval mission to protect ships from attacks by Yemen's Iran-backed Houthi militia in the Red Sea, European diplomats said on Tuesday, after the launch of a U.S.-led mission in the region. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:40:19 GMT EUZMWQB6Q5JYBCJJF4NFMMP4TI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-states-give-nod-red-sea-mission-deter-houthis-diplomats-2024-01-16/Andrew Gray, John Irish, Sabine Siebold世界欧洲
Arctic blast ends New York snow drought, brings record cold to WestMillions of Americans awoke on Tuesday to snow, freezing rain and frigid temperatures as an Arctic blast gripped much of the United States, ending a nearly two-year "snow drought" in New York City and putting much of the West into a deep freeze. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:35:52 GMT 7FNCMUOII5KY3IGIZCQNE4INYI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/arctic-blast-ends-new-york-snow-drought-brings-record-cold-west-2024-01-16/Julia Harte, Rich Mckay世界美国
EU imposes sanctions on Hamas political leader in GazaThe European Union imposed sanctions on Tuesday on Yahya Sinwar, the political leader of Hamas in Gaza, over the Palestinian militant group's deadly attack on Israel last October. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:30:13 GMT 7OPKTQK3AJP2BHXWUQBMCK2KWA https://www.reuters.com/world/eu-imposes-sanctions-hamas-political-leader-gaza-2024-01-16/Piotr Lipinski世界
Austrian incest father, 88, could soon be eligible to apply for releaseAn Austrian man who held his daughter captive for 24 years and fathered seven children with her could be transferred from a unit for the criminally insane to prison where he would be eligible to apply for release, a court official said on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:26:41 GMT YJUUBUTK7FPL5CKNPHCZNF42VA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/austrian-incest-father-88-could-soon-be-eligible-apply-release-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia jails officer for buying wrong hardware to protect Crimean bridge from Ukrainian attack - TASSA court on Tuesday sentenced a former senior officer in the National Guard to six years in a prison colony after convicting him of buying equipment unable to protect the bridge which links southern Russia to Crimea, the TASS state news agency reported. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:21:34 GMT 7VDT47HLIZMILB4EZIIRLEZK4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-jails-officer-buying-wrong-hardware-protect-crimean-bridge-ukrainian-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Freed Gaza hostages mark birthday of baby still in captivityIsraelis released from captivity in Gaza reconvened in their ravaged border village on Tuesday to hold a solemn first-birthday ceremony for the infant of a family still held hostage. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:17:35 GMT 5XCH7PTIGZNLZJLVKTDDEX73YY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/freed-gaza-hostages-mark-birthday-baby-still-captivity-2024-01-16/Leonardo Benassatto世界中东
Congo police break up small protest over parliamentary election resultsPolice in Democratic Republic of Congo on Tuesday dispersed a small protest in the capital Kinshasa against the provisional results of the December legislative election, the latest flare-up in tensions over the disputed poll. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:08:23 GMT CHF3GTQHLZI5VDIOO2UY2TIDVY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-police-break-up-small-protest-over-parliamentary-election-results-2024-01-16/Reuters世界非洲
